name: Heartshot (itch)
description:
Made for the BC GDC FALL 20 Game Jam 

The theme was: Arena

(NOTE: This game is in  a heavy Prototype Stage. At most the mechanics are available)

Boom! Heartshot! An experimental game mechanic combined with the side scrolling SHMUP formula

Controls:

Move with the WASD or Arrow Keys

Left Click to place a Heart Pointer, Pointer's create a Link to the next pointer placed down after it and so on

Right Click to Fire off any created Links. When Links are fired any Enemy in contact with a Link will take damage.

You can also Reflect incoming attacks by placing a Heart Pointer (Left Click) and Firing it (Right Click) before placing another one down. Any overlapping projectiles will be shot in the direction you're character's position compared to the Pointers

Reflect enemies and Fire links with multiple present to rack up a high score!
